p: Cells were seeded into 96-well plates at a density of 1 × 10 5 cells/well and cultured at 37˚C for 24 h. Essential oils from crude and bran-processed AL (0.5, 1, 10, 100, and 1000 μg/mL) were added and incubated for 12, 24, 48, and 72 h respectively. The cell viabilities were measured by MTT assay.
